section.title: How do I change the auto-formating preferences for the Visual Page Editor?
section.para: JBoss HTML/JSP editor uses basic eclipse HTML formatter to format files. So if you want to change preferences of formatter for the Visual Page Editor, you should change it for eclipse html editor (open Window > Preferences, then choose Web > HTML Files > Editor ).
